resources.string:
NXLoader is an exploit implementation for "the" Tegra X1 bootrom vulnerability. It is based on the fusée gelée exploit by ktemkin, and the ShofEL2 exploit by fail0verflow, just ported to the Android platform.

Connect your Switch and put it in RCM mode to start pwning.

https://github.com/DavidBuchanan314/NXLoader

Twitter: @David3141593
